#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

int main(){
    unsigned int t,n;
    scanf("%u",&t);
    while(t){
        scanf("%u",&n);
        n=n>>1;
        if(n&1==1){
            n=n>>1;
            printf("%d\n",n*(n+1));
        }
        else{
            n *=n;
            printf("%d\n",n>>2);

        }
        t--;
    }
    return 0;
}
